item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 1, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Linkpreview, see how your sites looks in social media and chat apps (60 points | 17 comments)
2. Founder Mode (335 points | 209 comments)
3. Einstein's Other Theory of Everything (79 points | 21 comments)

6. Building LLMs from the Ground Up: A 3-Hour Coding Workshop (718 points | 80 comments)
7. The web's clipboard, and how it stores data of different types (28 points | 2 comments)
8. Godot on iPad, Toolbars, Importers, Embedding, Debugger (59 points | 24 comments)
9. Playstation 2 GS emulation – the final frontier of Vulkan compute emulation (157 points | 41 comments)

12. Build Your Own Z80 Computer: Design Guidelines and Application (1981) (57 points | 7 comments)
13. Did your car witness a crime? (249 points | 510 comments)
14. Anarchy in Sudan has spawned the world’s worst famine in 40 years (160 points | 202 comments)

17. A better HTML input experience (custom elements and the AOM) (2017) (16 points | 3 comments)

19. Percona Everest: open-source automated database provisioning and management (79 points | 35 comments)
20. WatchYourLAN: Lightweight Network IP Scanner (160 points | 20 comments)
21. The Null Pointer (57 points | 8 comments)
22. Brazil's X ban is sending lots of people to Bluesky (323 points | 548 comments)
23. Client-side QR code generator with SVG output (135 points | 27 comments)
24. Astronomers puzzled by little red galaxies that seem impossibly dense (72 points | 47 comments)
25. The Design and Implementation of the CPython Virtual Machine (39 points | 3 comments)
26. Continue (YC S23) Is Hiring a Software Engineer in San Francisco ( | hide)
27. Show HN: A retro terminal text editor for GNU/Linux coded in C (C-edit) (157 points | 46 comments)
28. Show HN: Typeform alternative, turns Markdown to forms (170 points | 67 comments)
29. Ask HN: How To: Internal Documentation? (23 points | 38 comments)
